description: This schema defines how a test suite is properly formatted

token.description: The token required to be send back that binds the reply to the ASSERT task

test.description: The name of the current test

task.description: The name of the current task

msgs.description: The array of messages to parse through

items.description: A message received by the API tester script

t.description: The timestamp of the message, relative since start of test
